013package org.apache.juneau.objecttools;
014
015import org.apache.juneau.*;
016
017/**
018 * Common interface for matchers used by the {@link ObjectSearcher} class.
019 *
020 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
021 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/ObjectTools">Overview &gt; juneau-marshall &gt; Object Tools</a>
022 * </ul>
023 */
024public abstract class AbstractMatcher {
025
026   /**
027    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if this matcher matches the specified object..
028    *
029    * @param cm The class type of the object being matched.  Never <jk>null</jk>.
030    * @param o The object being matched.  Never <jk>null</jk>.
031    * @return <jk>true</jk> if the specified object matches the specified pattern.
032    */
033   public abstract boolean matches(ClassMeta<?> cm, Object o);
034}
